snippet.title: Ballad of Antara - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
Ballad of Antara is an upcoming fantasy Action RPG from TipsWorks Studio and Infoldgames, releasing in 2025 on PlayStation 5.

A faraway land is on the verge of being lost to a conflict from eons ago, and the invasion that followed it. Embark on a perilous journey, seek towering divine creatures, to reclaim the twisted and lost fundamentals of the world.

#BalladofAntara #ps5 #ps5games
